casebody.data:
Tuesday, March 27, 2001

MOTION DOCKET

01-253. State v. Bryan.

Cuyahoga C.P. No. CR393660. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of execution be, and hereby is, granted, pending disposition of this appeal.
